item.title: Adrenaline

item.title: Serotonin
item.description: General Description Name Value Level S-1 / C-1 Discovered 1963 / div. Synonym 5-Hydroxytryptamine / 5-HT Molecular formula C₁₀H₁₂N₂O CAS 50-67-9 SMILES NCCC1=CNC2=C1C=C(O)C=C2 InChI InChI=1S/C10H12N2O/c11-4-3-7-6-12-10-2-1-8(13)5-9(7)10/h1-2,5-6,12-13H,3-4,11H2 Precursor 1 [M+H]⁺ 177.10224 Precursor 2 [M+H-NH₃]⁺ 160.07569 Precursor 3 HDX 4 Precursor HDX 1 [M(D₄)+D]⁺ 182.
